article.title: This is a companion to the On.org
article.para: document. Org.org is the more experimental side of things.

section.title: David Touretzky. "Common Lisp. A Gentle Introduction to Symbolic Computation."
section.programlisting: (defun average (x y) (let ((sum (+ x y))) (list x y 'average 'is (/ sum 2.0))))
